Posts.Content: EmilyInOntario wrote: I had my first round of chemo yesterday ( Friday) and wondered if everyone would share how they felt those first few days and if it gets better? Or those of you who also have just started chemo..how are you feeling? I didn't expect to feel so drained and tired.( on FEC) The anti nausea meds seem to be helping but no real appetite now. I am finding eating small amounts frequently really helps ie, a little soup here, a few nachos or crackers there, a bit of applesauce or pudding etc.Sipping ice water frequently. So glad coffee still tastes good. Some things don't taste the same now. I was told FEC would likely cause diarrhea..think I'm heading the opposite direction... Dx 9/20/2010, IDC, 3cm, Stage IIB, Grade 3, 2/20 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Dx 6/17/2014, Stage IV, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Those first few days of chemo... EmilyInOntario
